data.name: 0000 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The Singularity Point has been successfully erased.

data.name: 0001 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: On the lower left corner of the screen the remaining Singularity Points and Quota,

data.name: 0002 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: will decrease.

data.name: 0003 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You will clear the stage when the number of remaining Points becomes 0.

data.name: 0004 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: However, if you allow the time limit to reach 0 first,

data.name: 0005 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: it will result in Time Over instead.

data.name: 0006 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If the quota is reached by then,

data.name: 0007 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: then the stage will be cleared. But if the quota is not met,

data.name: 0008 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Game Over will occur.

data.name: 0009 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Pressing the Y button will pause the game and change the screen,

data.name: 0010 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: allowing you to review the entire map.

data.name: 0011 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: On the full map you will be able to see materialized Points and Investigation results.

data.name: 0012 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: While you are on the pause screen time is stopped,

data.name: 0013 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: letting you leisurely review the situation.

data.name: 0014 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: However please note that Singularity Points not fully erased will still restore themselves.

data.name: 0015 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Besides this, the pause screen also shows things like power ups, special abilities, and levels.

data.name: 0016 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Information useful for forming a strategy will be displayed.

data.name: 0017 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: In order to destroy all of the Singularity Points before the time limit,

data.name: 0018 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: it is important to investigate efficiently.

data.name: 0019 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: With the investigate action you can inspect tiles 1 space away from the Brigade member.

data.name: 0020 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: But this will not materialize the Singularity Point.

data.name: 0021 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Investigate wide areas efficiently so the results do not overlap with each other,

data.name: 0022 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: and you will be able to quickly deduce the location of the Singularity Point.

data.name: 0023 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Once the location has been deduced you can quickly use the Search Point action.

data.name: 0024 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: And then rub the materialized Singularity Point with your stylus to erase it.

data.name: 0025 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Don't forget that every unnecessary Search causes time to pass.

data.name: 0026 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: That's why it's important to form a strategy based on the pause map.

data.name: 0027 (584.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: This is especially the case if you have a low Haruhi Meter and few Topics.
